trans-unit.source: The message header type.
trans-unit.target: 消息头类型。

trans-unit.source: Represents the content of a SOAP header.
trans-unit.target: 表示 SOAP 标头的内容。

trans-unit.source: A message header contains optional metadata that describe a message, encapsulated by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> class.
trans-unit.target: 消息头包含用于描述消息的可选元数据，由 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> 类包装。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader`1" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader`1" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The content of the new header.
trans-unit.target: 新标头的内容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader`1" /> class with the specified header content.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的标头内容初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader`1" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The content of the new header.
trans-unit.target: 新标头的内容。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the header must be understood.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，指示是否必须理解该标头。

trans-unit.source: The targeted recipient of the message header.
trans-unit.target: 消息头的目标接收方。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the header should be relayed.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，指示是否应该中继标头。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader`1" /> class with the specified header content and metadata.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的标头内容和元数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader`1" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the targeted recipient of the message header.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置消息头的目标接收方。

trans-unit.source: The targeted recipient of the message header.
trans-unit.target: 消息头的目标接收方。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串("")。

trans-unit.source: If this property is empty, the header is interpreted as targeted for the ultimate recipient of the message.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为空，则消息头被解释为以消息的最终接收方为目标。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content of the header.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标头的内容。

trans-unit.source: The content of the header.
trans-unit.target: 标头的内容。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the header XML element
trans-unit.target: 标头 XML 元素的本地名称

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the header XML element.
trans-unit.target: 标头 XML 元素的命名空间 URI。

trans-unit.source: Gets the message header with the specified namespace and local name.
trans-unit.target: 获取具有指定命名空间和本地名称的消息头。

trans-unit.source: A message header with the specified namespace and local name.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定命名空间和本地名称的消息头。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the header must be understood, as stated in the SOAP 1.1/1.2 specification.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否必须理解标头，如 SOAP 1.1/1.2 规范所述。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the header must be understood; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果必须理解标头，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true` and the message receiver cannot interpret the message header, the message is not processed and an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 `true` 且消息接收方无法解释消息头，则不会处理消息并且会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false`, the receiver can ignore the message header and continue processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 `false`，则接收方可忽略消息头并继续进行处理。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the header should be relayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否应该中继标头。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the header should be relayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应该中继标头，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: As stated in the SOAP 1.1 spec, this value is always `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如 SOAP 1.1 规范中所述，该值始终为 `false`。
